title: Amadeus : distribution market share 2010 to 2019
summary: This statistic illustrates the mortgage market share of the united kingdom ( UK ) based nationwide Building Society from 2014 to 2019 . It can be seen that nationwide increased its share of the mortgage market overall during the period under observation , reaching a share of 13.4 percent as of the year ending 2019 . The smallest mortgage market share for nationwide was found in 2011 , when a market share of 10.4 percent was recorded .
gold: This statistic shows the Amadeus distribution platform market share of global air travel distribution systems from 2010 to 2019 . In 2019 , the Amadeus held 44 percent of the global air travel distribution systems market . In 2019 , the revenue of Amadeus was 6.25 billion U.S. dollars .
